text: Jérôme van der Zijl (born 24 August 1988 in Brussels) is a Belgian footballer who plays as a defender. His club teams include Lierse S.K., RAEC Mons, KSC Grimbergen, and A.F.C. Tubize. He married tennis player Yanina Wickmayer in 2017.http://www.standaard.be/cnt/dmf20170715_02974235 ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian footballers Category:Belgian First Division A players Category:Association football defenders Category:Sportspeople from Brussels Category:R.A.E.C.
